information Research admin Miscellaneous Dr. Martin Kleppmann Associate ProfessorSince 2024 I'm an Associate Professor in Cambridge. My research is on decentralised systems, local-first collaboration software, and security protocols. My book, Designing Data-Intensive Applications, covers the architecture of a broad range of databases and distributed data processing systems. Over 200,000 copies have been sold, and it has been translated into eight languages. For a full list of publications, conference talks, and blog posts, please see my personal website. You can also follow me on Mastodon and on Bluesky.
